titles.title: John L. Burton Trail Act
A bill to designate the John L. Burton Trail in the Headwaters Forest Reserve, California.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 6/21/2005--Introduced. John L. Burton Trail Act - Designates any trail authorized by the final management plan for the Headwaters Forest Reserve, California, that is constructed to provide access to the southern end of the Headwaters Grove near the existing Salmon Trailhead as the "John. L. Burton Trail".
